nodes.text: Avarok was a male Sith pureblood who was a member of the Dread Host, the servants of the Dread Masters during the Galactic War. A Force-user, Avarok was stationed in the ruptured vault on the planet Belsavis with Guardsman Varrow, but after Avarok was defeated in battle by enemies of the Dread Host, Avarok was choked to death by his commander Lord Tagriss all the way from Ilum.
